IONIAN SEA.
SOUTHERN ADRIATIC SEA.
FIVE METER VESSEL, EIGHT PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED
AND ADRIFT VICINITY CORFU (39-40N 019-45E).
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 390 6592 4145,
5908 4409, FAX: 390 6592 2737, 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: CGCP3REP4@MIT.GOV.IT.
